__e: When the going gets tough, the two of you really man up.
You know, you may not know this about me, But I didn't really have a lot of close friends before I met you.
I want us to be real friends again. There's something... between us, and I don't like it. I want it to go away.
I was fine with not having any real friends, and being so set in my ways has caused me to hurt someone I really care about.
I have real feelings for this girl.
I mean, she can't have real feelings for this guy?
I think I might have actual feelings for him.
There wasn't any room for any real feelings.
If I knew I would die like this, then I would have told you my true feelings.
Well,okay,this is good because... you know,if this experience helped you to realize your true feelings,then,uh... then we did somethinggood here.
I need friends. Like proper friends.
{\pos(120,270)}go from casual work friends to actual good friends.
Okay, and now these... these tests are... are real tests?
You claim your feelings for me are real. You say you want me back. Tell me why.
Maybe his memories weren't real, and neither are yours.
And everyone's so genuine and level-headed.
All these years, you asked me about your birth parents.
I think I'm old enough for you to tell me who my real parents are.
You really care about these people who aren't even your real parents?
Not when there's so many real heroes out there living and serving every day.
I've seen heroes. You're not even close.
But the good ones... The real deal... They're not heroes because of what they have that we don't.
